o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: Check acces Type Is Read-only (MDDE)
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: DijkC1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that the datasource has the Access Type set to Read-Only
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following objects do not pass custom check:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript:
Function %Check%(obj) %Check% = True
If obj.AccessType <> "RO" Then %Check% = False End if
End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt: Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) %Fix% = False obj.AccessType = "RO" If obj.AccessType = "RO" Then %Fix% = True outmsg = "Datasource " & obj.Name & " set to Read-Only" End if End Function
